title: What are some good K-pop girl group rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: So… I'm just going to do female artists in general. Groups: BLACKPINKBoombayahStayPlaying With FireDdu Du Ddu DuReallyEtc… BP has a lot of good reps. YG groups tend to be rap-focused(G)I-dleLatataOh My GodEtc… I recently started stanning (G)I-dle, but they have Soyeon. An AMAZING fourth generation rapper. A lot of their songs have great raps.2NE1Come Back HomeCrushGood to YouClap Your HandsEtc… CL and Minzy, y'all. Another YG group.MamamooHipEtc… Mamamoo has an amazing rap line. I just recently started stanning tho.K/DAPOP/STARSThe BaddestSoloists: CLDoneI QuitParadoxLiftedOne and OnlyEtc… I don't feel like writing out her entire solo discography. Sorry.Grazy GraceZombie HighPlanetEtc… Grace is also a YouTuber. Go Grazies!JessiGucciNunu NanaWho Dat BEtc… Can I just say YAASSS QUEEN. Thank you.WengieEmpire feat. Minnie ((G)I-dle)I actually just added her for Empire. Amazingly talented, has a YouTube channel.TymeeF*** Pretty RapstarEtc… Tymee is a rapper. I don't know any of her other songs.Other: Unpretty RapstarShe's ComingI don't stan, but they are literally a show for female rappers.True DamageGiantsTechnically they're a mixed-gender group.For soloists I didn't include ones in a group currently. Jennie and Soyeon have solos out.

what i'm about to list are my personal opinions. What i thought qualify as good may be trash to you.. and that's fine. the list is not ranked.. bcs i just couldn't be bothered to. Oh My God by (G)-idleLion by (G)-idleCrazy by 4minuteMe & You by EXIDDestiny by MamamooHobgoblin by CLCMe by CLCGucci by JessiHow's This by HyunAPop/Stars by KDA멘봉 by CLi know i'm missing a lot of great rap kpop songs by amazing queens so feel free to add some -bella
